#labels Configuration

= Introduction =

This page explains the configuration options. 

= Install =

Get the lastest version from [http://code.google.com/p/appmedia-freenas/downloads/list Downloads] Tab.
  * Make _ext_ directory at _/usr/local/www/_, like this: _/usr/local/www/ext/_
  * Uncompres de *tgz* file in this directory. This action create the directory *appmedia*.
  * Run this commands:
   * ln -s /usr/local/www/ext/appmedia/services_appmedia.php /usr/local/www/services_appmedia.php
   * ln -s /usr/local/www/ext/appmedia/services_appmedia_edit.php /usr/local/www/services_appmedia_edit.php
   * ln -s /usr/local/www/ext/appmedia/services_appmedia_tools.php /usr/local/www/services_appmedia_tools.php

= Local database =

Locate and open file *class.appmedia.php* and search function _construct()_

 * Modify variable _$this->dsn_ with your local access.

= Scan directories =

Locate and open file *class.appmedia.php* and search function _construct()_

 * Modify the array variable _$this->dirSources_ with your directories to be scanned.

= Database management =

Locate and open file *class.appmedia.php* and search function _construct()_

 * Modify boolean variable _$this->manageBBDD_. Set *true* to enable Create or Drop database, set to *false* disable Create or Drop functions.
